Hello, world!

My name is Rahul Raj. I am available over the web with the handle ‘rahulrajpl’.

This blog will feature various tricks/tips for all beginners interested in Machine Learning, Data Mining and Blockchain Technology. Majority of the contents are aggregated/ borrowed from teachings by Prof. Piyush Rai and Prof. Purushottam Kar at IIT, Kanpur mixed and messed with tips and tricks I learn on my own from various other sources.

If you find any content outdated/ irrelevant/ erroneous kindly mail me. You can find my contact details in my website.

Thanks and regards,

-rahul
